name: Grotesque Realm
description:
"Grotesque Realm" is a Co-Op PVE and PVP game puts you and your team in a creepy, unknown grotesque world.


Players must work together to occupy and protect their base from waves of terrifying creatures. But the danger doesn't stop there - other players are also trying to occupy the same base, so you'll need to fend them off as well!
As you progress through the game, your team need to occupy more bases to survive better. Each base presents its own unique challenges and rewards, so you'll need to choose your strategy carefully.



Looting

There will be different type of Loot, there may be different way to open it.
You'll need to work together to scavenge for resources, finding weapons and tools, you can choose different job to help your team and fight off the deadly creatures that hunt you!

World Time Events

This world has 4 season, the building in center will shows different color at night for showing the season.
in the different season it has some events like Halloween, Christmas and New year firework.

Weather

The weather is unpredictable. Each season brings a unique set of weather conditions.
It also have a tangible impact on gameplay. Certain mobs or creatures may only appear during specific weather conditions, providing a new level of challenge and reward for players.

---------------
So gather your team, and prepare to defend your base against all odds. The unknown awaits you.
